snippet.title: McPixel Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.McPixel.net

McPixel is a save-the-day guy that you guide through short challenges in an oldschool point'n'click fashion. The goal in each challenge is to prevent stuff from blowing up using available tools! You have only 20 seconds to save the day! Think quick!

= Features =
100 mindblowing levels
Bonuses, secrets and more
Free DLC for everyone!!!!
185 BMP mindblowing music!
Switchable pixel filters
Level creator


= Platforms = 
OUT NOW ON Windows, Linux and  Mac OS!!! 
Coming soon to iPhone, iPod, iPad, Android and Blackberry
Coming bit later to Commodore 64

= Credits =
Intro music by Sos
Theme song by super talented Svetlana!
http://svetlana.aanaaanaaanaaana.net/
Trailer theme song: http://mcpixel.net/Svetlana-McTrailer.xm
Trailer intro song: http://mcpixel.net/mcchoir.mp3
